title: John Archibald: Alabamian vs. American
teaser: A federal judge who struck down Alabama's same-sex marriage ban has released a letter clarifying the ruling applies to all government officials, not just those named in the suit.  The ruling is on hold for now, but it's the latest in a legal firestorm sparked Friday when the decision came down.  We talk about it with Alabama Media Group columnist John Archibald.
